name: makeComponentFromLayer
description:
Recursively renders a NestedLayer using NestedLayerComponent. If the NestedLayer has
children, use this function as it not only renders a single NestedLayer, but also the subtree
of layers under the NestedLayer recursively.

params.name: layer
params.description: The layer to represent with a React component

return.description: A react component representing the given NestedLayer.

name: render
description: Renders the component

name: toggleSelected
description:
Calls the toggle selected state handler passed by the parent to change the selected state of
the layer

name: getSwatch
description: Returns a data URL suitable for use in a the src of an that contains the base 64 encoded layer swatch

name: render
description: Renders the component

name: NestedLayers
description:
Leaflet plugin to display a hierarchial version of {@link http://leafletjs.com/reference-1.1.0.html#control-layers L.Control.Layers}. Uses React to wrap the
NestedLayersComponent.

params.name: hierarchy
params.description: The hierarchy to display in the control

params.name: element
params.description: The DOM element to bind the control to

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration options that dictate how the control should behave

name: constructor
description: Initialize the plugin and {@link #NestedLayers#attach attaches} to the DOM.

params.name: hierarchy
params.description: The hierarchy to display in the control

params.name: element
params.description: The DOM element to bind the control to

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration options that dictate how the control should behave

params.name: options.followAncestorVisibility
params.description:
Deselecting any ancestor makes its
children invisible (without changing their selected state)

params.name: options.propogateDeselectToChildren
params.description:
Deselecting a parent also deselects
children (by changing their state)

params.name: options.followAncestorMutability
params.description:
Deselecting any ancestor disables its
children (cannot change children's selected state)

name: hierarchy
description: The underlying hierarchy of layers the plugin visually represents

name: h
description: Shorthand accessor for the {@link #NestedLayers#hierarchy hierarchy} property

name: element
description: The DOM element that the control attaches to

name: el
description: Shorthand accessor for the {@link #NestedLayers#element element} property

name: component
description: The React component under the hood

name: isAttached
description: True if the plugin has attached itself to the DOM element

name: options
description: Configuration options

name: attach
description:
Bind to the DOM. Internally, it checks to see if it has already been attached, and if not,
uses React to render the {@link #NestedLayers#component component} to the specified {@link
#NestedLayers#element element}.

name: detach
description: Unbind from the DOM. Releases the {@link #NestedLayers#element element} for reuse.

name: src/Leaflet.TOC.Control.js
src/Leaflet.TOC.NestedLayer.js
generateID
description:
Generate a ID number guaranteed to be unique.
IDs are composed of a pseudorandom 4-digit number suffixed by an incrementing counter.

name: NestedLayer
description:
Wraps a Leaflet Layer to allow that layer to be the "parent" of other layers by having
"child" layers

name: constructor
description: Creates a new NestedLayer.

params.name: layerID
params.description: ID of the layer on the origin.

params.name: name
params.description: Name of the layer on the origin; display-friendly

params.name: layer
params.description: Leaflet layer

params.name: map
params.description: Leaflet map

params.name: props
params.description: Optional properties

name: layerID
description: Layer ID as specified by the server

name: name
description: Layer name

name: layer
description: Underlying Leaflet layer

name: map
description: Leaflet Map to attach to

name: children
description: Child layers

name: parent
description: Parent layer

name: minZoom
description: Minimum zoom level for this layer to be visible

name: maxZoom
description: Maximum zoom level for this layer to be visible

name: id
description: Unique ID generated for each NestedLayer

name: enabled
description: Whether the user may freely toggle this layer on and off

name: disabled
description: The inverse of #enabled

name: enable
description: Enable the layer

name: disable
description: Disable the layer

name: toggleEnabled
description: Toggle the layer's enabled state

params.description: Tree or subtree of NestedLayers

params.name: change
params.description: A key/value pair of state changes to apply to each layer in the tree
